General.Name: Kleangas Energy Tech
General.Description: CaliPharms, Inc. engages in the medicinal Cannabis Industry in the United States. It focuses on the THC and CBD beverage industry. The company was formerly known as Kleangas Energy Technologies, Inc. and changed its name to CaliPharms, Inc. in January, 2017. CaliPharms, Inc. is based in Temecula, California.
General.Address: 33175 Temecula Parkway, Temecula, CA, United States, 92592
